name: PRTG Network Monitor
description: PRTG Network Monitor alerts via webhook. 29 alert types covering device status, sensors, bandwidth, and performance metrics.
author: OpsConductor

alerts.title: Ping
alerts.description: ICMP Ping sensor failure. Target device is not responding to ping requests. Device may be offline, network path blocked, or ICMP filtered.

alerts.title: Traffic
alerts.description: Network traffic sensor alert. Interface bandwidth utilization or packet errors exceed threshold.
PRTG status code 1 - Unknown state. Sensor has not yet collected data or is in an undefined state. Wait for next scan cycle.
PRTG status code 10 - Unusual value detected. Reading is outside historical norms but not necessarily bad. Review for anomalies.
PRTG status code 11 - Sensor type not licensed. PRTG license does not include this sensor type. Upgrade license or remove sensor.
PRTG status code 12 - Paused until specified date/time. Sensor will auto-resume at scheduled time.
PRTG status code 13 - Device or sensor is down. Target not responding or service failed. Check connectivity and service status.
PRTG status code 14 - Partial failure. Some channels failed while others succeeded. Review individual channel status.
PRTG status code 2 - Sensor is scanning/collecting data. Normal operation, data will be available shortly.
PRTG status code 3 - Sensor is healthy and operating normally. All monitored values within acceptable thresholds.
PRTG status code 4 - Warning threshold exceeded. One or more monitored values outside normal range but not critical. Investigate soon.
PRTG status code 5 - Critical threshold exceeded or sensor in error state. Immediate attention required. Service may be impacted.
PRTG status code 6 - No Probe available. The probe monitoring this sensor is offline or disconnected. Check probe server.
PRTG status code 7 - Sensor is paused by user. Monitoring temporarily suspended. Resume when ready.
PRTG status code 8 - Sensor paused by dependency. Parent device or sensor is down, so this sensor is auto-paused.
PRTG status code 9 - Sensor paused by schedule. Outside of monitoring window defined in schedule.

alerts.title: Camera
alerts.description: Camera status sensor alert. Monitored camera is reporting issues or is unreachable.

alerts.title: Disk Free
alerts.description: Disk space sensor alert. Available disk space on monitored volume is below threshold. Free up disk space or expand storage.

alerts.title: Down
alerts.description: PRTG "down" status text - Target device or service is not responding. Network issue, service crash, or device offline.

alerts.title: Paused
alerts.description: PRTG "paused" status text - Monitoring intentionally suspended. User action or schedule. No alerts generated while paused.

alerts.title: Probe Health
alerts.description: PRTG probe health issue. Remote probe experiencing problems. Check probe connectivity and system resources.

alerts.title: Snmp Disk Free
alerts.description: SNMP disk space sensor alert. Disk space queried via SNMP is below configured threshold. Monitor disk usage trends.

alerts.title: Snmp Traffic
alerts.description: SNMP traffic sensor alert. Network interface traffic or errors exceed threshold. Check for bandwidth saturation or interface errors.

alerts.title: Tunnel
alerts.description: VPN tunnel sensor failure. IPsec or VPN tunnel is down. Check tunnel endpoint connectivity and configuration.

alerts.title: Unknown
alerts.description: PRTG "unknown" status text - Sensor state cannot be determined. May be initializing, probe issue, or configuration error.

alerts.title: Unusual
alerts.description: PRTG "unusual" status text - Anomaly detected. Value significantly different from historical baseline. May indicate emerging issue.

alerts.title: Up
alerts.description: PRTG "up" status text - Device/service is healthy and responding normally. All monitored values within acceptable range.

alerts.title: Uptime
alerts.description: System uptime sensor alert. Device uptime changed unexpectedly, indicating a reboot occurred.

alerts.title: Warning
alerts.description: PRTG "warning" status text - Monitored value exceeded warning threshold. Not critical yet but trending toward problem.

clear_events.description: Alerts auto-resolve when condition no longer detected
